detail_desc: Pyjamas with a vest top and pair of leggings in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend. Top with a V-shaped opening at the top. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist, a vertical seam down the legs and a slit at the hems.
Double-knit jumper with a wide, lace-trimmed, ribbed V-neck. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves.

Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a decorative drawstring, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, cap sleeves, yoke at the back and rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy, textured, patterned cotton weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with a tie detail and small opening at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam below the bust with pleats, and a flared skirt with lots of volume. Lined bodice.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded collar and press-studs at the back and crotch. Scalloped edges at the collar and cuffs.
Gently fitted dress in washed denim with a V-neck front and back and a zip that runs all the way down the front.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a layer of lace at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back with a knot detail. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight wide legs.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short, flared, off-the-shoulder dress in lace with elastication around the top and short, wide raglan sleeves. Raw, scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Satin lining with a scalloped edge.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a pocket at the top, press-studs at the sides and adjustable straps with press-stud fasteners. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-4Y). Seam with belt loops at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline.
Short top in soft, printed cotton jersey with long, printed sleeves.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Pyjama shorts in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Alice band with decorations on top.
Top in airy jersey with a print motif on the front, braided detail at the top and asymmetric raw-edge hem.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Moon-shaped earrings made from recycled silver decorated with sparkly stones and gemstones. Length 4 cm.
Longer jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a slightly deeper V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Double-layered hats in a soft, fine knit.
Short shorts in soft twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Pockets in the side seams.
Long, pleated skirt in a softly draping crêpe weave with a high waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening in one side. Lined.

Long, wide dress in a cool viscose weave with a slight sheen. V-neck, a yoke at the back, gathered seams on the shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Gathered seam under the bust and on the skirt. Unlined.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Dress in a textured, patterned weave with a round neck and long, wide sleeves with buttons at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with pleats at the front. Unlined.
Fitted, polo-neck top in soft jersey with long sleeves.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Fine-knit polo-neck jumper in a merino wool blend with a ribbed collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tights in recycled polyester with an elasticated waist. 200 denier.

Shaping briefs in microfibre with a light shaping effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Laser-cut edges around the legs for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.

Suit trousers in a softly draping weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and an adjustable tab with a metal fastener at the sides. Zip fly with a concealed button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover top and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Seam with elastication at the back of the waist, a detachable tie belt, concealed side pockets and wide, straight legs. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and side stripes.

Long dress in a crêpe weave with a decorative knot detail at the bust and satin-lined, boned bodice with a silicone trim at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back and a softly draping flare to the hem. Lined.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short, lace cap sleeves.
Reversible sun hat in cotton. One side with an all-over print and appliqué and the other in a solid colour. Ties under the chin. Width of brim 3.5 cm.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy crinkled weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Backpack in woven fabric with leather sections, a handle and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment, and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Padded back plate, and adjustable tabs with plastic fasteners at the sides and bottom. Lined. Size 15x30x42 cm.
Soft, non-wired nursing bras in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace. Opening cups with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide, straight-style jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a slightly wider neckline, low dropped shoulders, long, close-fitting sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a sheen. Deep neckline with a zip at the top, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Wide, velvet-covered Alice band with a large bow at the top.

Fully lined swimsuit with a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wrapover top, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, gathers at the sides for a draped effect and side support.

Boots in waterproof, functional fabric. High shaft with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the front and an elasticated drawstring at the top. Removable, quick-dry fleece lining. Reflective details. The boots have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long, embroidered sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar and contrasting colour ties at the top. Buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Trousers in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top, covered elastication and a drawstring. Diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom at the top. Lined.
Hat in a soft knit with a decorative pompom on top, ribbed hem and earflaps. Thermal fleece lining.
Sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the back and shoulder straps with scalloped edges and broderie anglaise that meet at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals with open sides and toes and crossover straps at the front. Imitation leather insoles.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress with a cotton jersey top and skirt in woven fabric. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Oversized cardigan in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable hook and loop tab and jersey inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs. Flap patch pockets with a press-stud and a zipped lift pass pocket on one sleeve. Snow flap with press-studs at the waist. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons. Lining and filling in recycled polyester.
Cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim, gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Shorter-style blouse in an airy cotton weave with a wide neckline, concealed press-studs down the front and tiered flounces at the top and down the sleeves.
Slip-on trainers with fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and a fake fly with decorative buttons.

Knee-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Fitted fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton piqué with a collar and button placket.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck jumper in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
